Note

This class's private function `residuals_lag` is using GPL-3 licensed code from (R package "forecast" by Rob Hyndman, Mitchell O'Hara-Wild, Christoph Bergmeir, Slava Razbash and Earo Wang) https://github.com/robjhyndman/forecast/blob/c87f33/R/checkresiduals.R from lines 122 and 123 to calculate the lag parameter.
